column4: anyone one else who can figure out why gnome isnt starintg feel free to look at my xorg log:)... http://paste.ubuntu.com/297789/
you could try moving ~/.gnome2/ and ~/.gnome/ to another location
also, you might need to do something with ~/.gnome2_private/ and ~/.gnome_private/
you could mount your existing installation to a temporary directory in the live cd then look in your home directory there
I tried removing ~/.gnome2/ and ~/.gnome/ etc but I am still anable to boot into gnome
